BUS_EVENT

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

BusEvent

public BusEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                java.lang.String id)
Constructs a BusEvent with the event source and a unique event id. This id is used for querying for the events.

Parameters:
source - The Object representing the event information.
id - A string containing the event id.
Method Detail

getID

public java.lang.String getID()
Returns the unique event id for this particular bus event.

Returns:
String The event id.
